events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening of your credentials and background has been completed successfully by our HR team.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions; this helps us proceed with scheduling interviews quickly.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 2 PM UTC with our lead software developer.
You have completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving and coding skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 11th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed alignment with our company values and work environment.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position, along with details on salary, benefits, and start date.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join the team.
You accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer role, and we are excited to welcome you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started with initial training sessions and introduction to your engineering team.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully with your full integration into the engineering department.
